statements: SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics;
SELECT farm_name, water_usage FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE carbon_footprint > 50;
SELECT id, farm_name, water_usage, carbon_footprint FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE water_usage < 100;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE id = 3;
SELECT farm_name, carbon_footprint FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE water_usage < 20;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC
SELECT farm_name, carbon_footprint FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE carbon_footprint < 50
SELECT id, farm_name, water_usage, carbon_footprint FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE farm_name LIKE 'A%' AND carbon_footprint > 50
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE water_usage < 200 AND carbon_footprint < 100 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM sustainability_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_name, water_usage FROM sustainability_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, carbon_footprint FROM sustainability_reports WHERE water_usage > 100;
SELECT farming_name, location, total_yield FROM urban_farming ORDER BY farming_area ASC;
SELECT farming_id, farming_name, location FROM urban_farming WHERE total_yield < 5000;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_name, carbon_footprint FROM sustainability_reports WHERE water_usage < 100;
SELECT farming_name, location FROM urban_farming WHERE total_yield > 5000 ORDER BY farming_area DESC;
SELECT SUM(water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM sustainability_reports;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_reports WHERE carbon_footprint > 200 ORDER BY report_date ASC, water_usage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage;
SELECT id, date, water_used FROM Water_Usage WHERE water_used > 100;
SELECT id, date, carbon_emission FROM Carbon_Footprint ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Urban_Farming_Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT report_id, water_used, carbon_emission FROM Urban_Farming_Reports JOIN Water_Usage ON Urban_Farming_Reports.water_usage_id = Water_Usage.id JOIN Carbon_Footprint ON Urban_Farming_Reports.carbon_footprint_id = Carbon_Footprint.id;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, carbon_emission FROM Carbon_Footprint WHERE carbon_emission > 1000;
SELECT id, report_date FROM Urban_Farming_Reports WHERE report_id = 5 AND water_usage_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT UF.id, WU.water_used, CF.carbon_emission FROM Urban_Farming_Reports UF JOIN Water_Usage WU ON UF.water_usage_id = WU.id JOIN Carbon_Footprint CF ON UF.carbon_footprint_id = CF.id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports, MAX(carbon_emission) AS max_carbon_emission FROM Urban_Farming_Reports UF JOIN Carbon_Footprint CF ON UF.carbon_footprint_id = CF.id;
SELECT * FROM water_usage;
SELECT date, liters_used FROM water_usage WHERE liters_used > 100;
SELECT urban_farm_name, location FROM urban_farming ORDER BY urban_farm_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT report_type FROM sustainability_reports;
SELECT id, emissions, date FROM carbon_footprint WHERE emissions < 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT liters_used, date FROM water_usage WHERE liters_used > 100 ORDER BY liters_used ASC;
SELECT location, area_sqft FROM urban_farming WHERE area_sqft BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT AVG(emissions) AS avg_emissions, MONTH(date) AS month FROM carbon_footprint GROUP BY MONTH(date) ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_type FROM sustainability_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Water_Usage;
SELECT Farm_ID, Date, Water_Used FROM Carbon_Footprint ORDER BY Farm_ID DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT Farm_ID FROM Farm WHERE Location='California';
SELECT Farm_ID, Date, Carbon_Emission FROM Carbon_Footprint WHERE Carbon_Emission > 100 ORDER BY Date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Report WHERE Type='Monthly' AND Date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Farm WHERE Size > 100
SELECT Farm_ID, Date FROM Water_Usage WHERE Water_Used > 50 ORDER BY Date DESC
SELECT * FROM Carbon_Footprint WHERE Carbon_Emission < 10
SELECT Farm.Farm_ID, Farm.Location, Report.Type FROM Farm INNER JOIN Report ON Farm.Farm_ID = Report.Farm_ID WHERE Report.Type = 'Monthly'
SELECT Farm.Location, Sum(Water_Used) AS Total_Water_Used FROM Farm INNER JOIN Water_Usage ON Farm.Farm_ID = Water_Usage.Farm_ID GROUP BY Farm.Location ORDER BY Total_Water_Used DESC
